name: Bookneto
description: A social platform for sharing school related documents such as past exams, notes and books.

name: UW Angel CLI
description: A command line interface to UW Angel. Can be used to download all your files.
author: Jamie Wong

name: Course Qualifier
description: The Course Qualifier helps you generate all possible course timetables without time conflicts. You can choose a path that allows you to sleep in and make the most efficient use of your time.
author: Thomas Dimson

name: Course Select
description:
Courselect helps you look up courses that you might be interested in taking without having to go to several websites to get the job done.
There is also information on your textbooks and you can compare prices between the UW BookStore and major online stores.
author: Scott Kuo

name: Quest Schedule Export
description: Helps export your class schedule so you can use it with Google Calendar, a mobile calendar application or anything else that uses the iCalendar format.
author: Viktor Stanchev

name: Jobmine Plus
description: Makes JobMine faster, easier to use, and less aesthetically painful.
author: Matthew Ng

name: Waterloo Co-op Map
description: Put your work term location on a map and find out where others are working using this Facebook app.
author: Viktor Stanchev

name: YouWaterloo Open Data API
description: A RESTful API to tens of data sets related to the University of Waterloo.
author: Kartik Talwar

name: UW Data
description: A RESTful API to the University of Waterloo's public data for course information.
author: Jeff Verkoeyen

name: UWaterloo Subreddit
description: News from around the university and other discussions.

name: UW Schedule
description: A social class schedule application for University of Waterloo students.
author: Casey Banner

name: OMG UW
description:
Have one of those moments you've got to share? Got a secret you need to get off your chest? Hear something on campus so stupid it needs to be on the internet?
These are OMG moments.
OMG UW is a blog dedicated to sharing these precious moments at the University of Waterloo. Inspired by FML, grouphug, PostSecret, Overheard at Western and more, this is the place to share your OMG moments easily and anonymously.
Have fun.

name: JobMine Interview Notifier
description: Allows you to set up automated interview notifications.
author: Mike Soares
